Question: This person served as a wartime governor, as the united colonies continued the Revolutionary War against Great Britain.
Hints: This person began his childhood education under the direction of tutors at Tuckahoe along with the Randolph children.
Peter this person died in 1757 and the ____ estate was divided between Peter's two sons; Thomas and Randolph.
Similarly, this person kept at Monticello an engraving of Maria done by Luigi Schiavonetti, from a drawing by Richard Cosway.
